author: djrtwo
content:
We've made the following spec releases in preparation for the Ropsten Merge upgrade
* Consensus Layer specs `v1.2.0-rc.1` -- Bopsten: https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/releases/tag/v1.2.0-rc.1
* Execution APIs (containing Engine APIs)  `v1.0.0-alpha.9` --  Balast: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/releases/tag/v1.0.0-alpha.9

*Note*: Execution Layer specs (EIP 3675 and 4399) are stable and will be moved to Last Call before Mainnet parameters are selected

Thank you to all of the contributors to this release!
